description:
Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Mega Mix+ is a rhythm game where you hit notes to the beat of one of 250+ songs.
Play through a selection of randomly chosen songs, collecting leeks
until you have enough to play and complete the goal song!
game: Hatsune Miku Project Diva Mega Mix+

1.0.1B.description: # Made a fix for modded songs that have multiple english names
1.0.1B.title: Mega Mix AP Beta - 1.0.1

1.0.2B.description: Fixed missing comma for song name (A song of wastelands, forests, and magic) when using rin and len covers

1.0.3B.description:
- Added song ids into item and location names
- Changed how item and locations are handled to sort issues with songs having the same name but different ids
1.0.3B.title: 1.0.3B

1.0.4B.description:
- Overhauled internal system to be more reliant on IDS
- IDS are now 'meaningful', but since ids now start at 1 logs on games using older AP versions may display incorrect item names
- Diva folder is now generated during generation if it is missing
- New pop up when opening the client to ask if you're using modded songs to avoid some confusion
- Item names no longer contain song ids
- Some options removed that were pointless (such as asking if you are using modded songs), rewrote some descriptions to be more accurate
1.0.4B.title: 1.0.4B

1.0.5B.description: - Added a new YAML option to auto remove songs when a song is cleared (still requires refresh)
1.0.5B.title: 1.0.5B

1.0.6B.description: Fixed folder generation happening at odd times
1.0.6B.title: 1.0.6B

1.0.7B.description:
#### - Changed how modding works to make it non-reliant on external files, should be simpler, check out the modding guide for details
#### - Removed need for the Diva folder, to all hosts glee
#### - Added in Junk (Courtesy of repodǝɹ), with an option to turn down duplicate song percentage, Junk items are "SAFE"'s that do nothing
#### - Removed /remove_cleared command, replaced with a toggle command /toggle_remove_cleared (still uses yaml option as default)
1.0.7B.title: 1.0.7B

1.0.8B.description:
- Fixed issue where some modded pack names were incompatible with new system
- Removed extra whitespace from song names
1.0.8B.title: 1.0.8B

1.0.9B.description:
### - APWorld now recognizes randomized YAMLS for modded content generation
### - Mod Data has been simplified on the APworld side
1.0.9B.title: 1.0.9B

1.1.0B.description: ### - Re-added unique item ID processing for cover songs.. whoops
1.1.0B.title: 1.1.0B

1.1.1.description: Added manual translitteration to catch more modded song names
1.1.1.title: Mega Mix AP Alpha - 1.1.1

1.1.1B.description:
### - Hotfixed an issue where ASCII chars would break generation
### - Expanded max additional song count for insane people
1.1.1B.title: 1.1.1B

1.1.2.description:
Added mod support for multiple players with different mods.
Requires a new set up:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/17NwFcPzmt5fnXz0GBvrJTlF40fCNcv052kWpM0OQ66o/edit
1.1.2.title: Mega Mix AP Alpha - 1.1.2

1.1.2B.description:
### - Hotfixed an issue where cover songs wouldn't unlock properly
### - Reinstated Remove_Cleared command, client does not auto clear songs upon connecting, but will clear after a song is beaten if the toggle is on, please use remove_cleared on initial connect
1.1.2B.title: 1.1.2B

1.1.3.description: Fixed songs which end in a blank space causing an error
1.1.3.title: Mega Mix AP Alpha - 1.1.3

1.1.3B.description:
NEW OPTIONS
- 'Always pick hardest' option (If an EXEXTREME exists, prioritize it over extreme, etc)
- Enable all difficulties (The song sent will still have an expected difficulty, but all difficulties will unlock and any of them count as a valid completion)

OTHER
- /restore_mods is now /restore_songs, and now restores the base game songs too
- Included /leek and /uncleared commands now display the song ids for troubleshooting
- Song Name Cleaning has underwent a rework, item names are now more accurate 
### (PLEASE REPORT ANY ISSUES WITH UNITY GAMES BEING UNABLE TO CONNECT WITH A DIVA WORLD INCLUDED SUCH AS ROR2, ULTRAKILL, etc, with item name changes comes potential problems, I haven't run into any in testing but I won't rule it out)
1.1.3B.title: 1.1.3B

1.1.4.description:
Client will now ask for modded JSON file on launch, simply press cancel if you are playing vanilla songs.

Fixes modded songs being unavailable.
1.1.4.title: Mega Mix AP Alpha - 1.1.4

1.1.4B.description:
- Internal changes to error handling for file paths
- toggle_auto_remove shortened to auto_remove
- bk_freeplay shortened to freeplay
- freeplay is now a toggle command
- fixed a bug where freeplay would unlock AP songs (oops)
- Dummy song now outputs text to client on clear for connection testing
1.1.4B.title: 1.1.4B

1.1.5B.description:
Changelog:

- Better yaml parsing for webhosts, modded songs will throw an error rather than stop generation entirely.
- Mod Data will only appear in template yamls
- Melt f2nd edition should now be viable (No longer skipping ID, it shares with an unused tutorial)
- Difficulty settings are now manual only, and all difficulties are always enabled
- Item names are now only the song name
- Unusable song limits should be caught earlier

Credit to repodǝɹ for the following:
- JSON generator changes and parsing have changed, get the latest version for modded songs
- If the world is set to autorelease on goal, songs will autorestore
- Some code clean up
1.1.5B.title: 1.1.5B

1.1.6B.description:
- Used logger for debugging instead of prints in some areas
- Modded songs now list their IDs to avoid overlapping cover issues (Including these songs will require adding the id) (SongName [SongID[)
- Code Cleanup
1.1.6B.title: 1.1.6B

1.1.8B.description:
- Fixed an issue where vanilla clients couldn't connect due to an oversight with options
- Made text instruction a bit clearer for mod data
1.1.8B.title: 1.1.8B

1.1.9B.description: Fixed an issue with the goal song ID being inaccurate, leading to failure to goal
1.1.9B.title: 1.1.9B

1.2.0B.description:
### Been a while right? 

**Big shoutout to repodǝɹ, they made a lot of these changes, I either did some tweaks or fixed some small issues mostly, and they put up with me procrastinating all this time..**

Lots of code optimization and clean-up, client's and generation should be faster.

Cleared songs are now available in freeplay
Auto remove songs is no longer called while in freeplay
Available songs (and goal if McGuffins are met) are now available in freeplay
Removed Whopper lyrics from the client (Copyright comes for us all..)

The APworld now also contains the JSON generator, available on 0.6.2 RC and above, it appears as an option in the AP Launcher.
1.2.0B.title: 1.2.0B

1.3.0B.description:
# Death link is here!
- **Death Link Amnesty**: additional own deaths before sending  
- **Non-lethal Death Link**: survive and heal for the next one  
- **10 second safety window**: die on receive without sending own death  

# Options Changes
Option groups for template YAML and WebHost
- Cheap is now a selectable grade, Complete a song with less than a Standard grade
- Added Include Song percentage
  - Limit guaranteed included songs to a percentage of total song count  
  - Songs not guaranteed by this return to the selection pool and may appear, otherwise excluded 

### Item Groups
- Base/DLC/Modded/Miku/Rin/Len/Luka/KAITO/MEIKOSongs
- Easily control batches of songs where item names are accepted  
- Fixed two songs not properly grouped to Luka  
- Deprecated `exclude_singers` option (now doubles as `include_singers`)  
- Modded songs not grouped per singer due to inaccuracies  

# Client Changes
- Leek label in the Client (`/leek` alternative)  
- Universal Tracker support (`/uncleared` alternative, mods require valid YAML as usual)  
- Additional mod pack restoration on Client close  
- Support for song packs that split their songs into individual folders  

# Technical Fixes
- Fix for rooms using `collect`  
- Fixed determinism when including songs  
- Unified mod DLLs — no need to switch for SLP  
- Changed selection to the **game exe** instead of the **mods folder**
1.3.0B.title: 1.3.0B

1.3.1B.description: Generation no longer shuffles regions for added gen speed
1.3.1B.title: 1.3.1B

1.4.0B.description:
### Added Traps!
- Added Sudden, Hidden, and Icon Traps with configurable options. 

### Other
- The Goal Song can now be given a potential list of songs to pick from, rather than have it be a random one within your settings.
- Fix for white screen when retrying from the results screen into a newly received Death Link
- Other small stability fixes
1.4.0B.title: 1.4.0B

1.4.2B.description:
- YAMLless Universal Tracker support
- The Goal Song no longer pulls from difficulty filtered songs
- Items from `/send` or `!getitem` are now properly handled
- Mod songs can no longer overwrite base songs
- Conflicting song IDs (rare) are now handled for different players
- The JSON Generator now has Copy and Save buttons when the mod string is generated, and a Help button
- Max star rating for new templates lowered from 10 stars to 8. Option groups and descriptions improved.
- The Client title is properly set even when using Universal Tracker
1.4.2B.title: 1.4.2B

1.4.3B.description: Fixed a timing issue when removing songs
1.4.3B.title: 1.4.3B

Beta.description:
- Added Singer Filtering
- Updated to use Archipelago 0.5.0 changes
Beta.title: Mega Mix AP Beta - 1.0.0
